ShortBio: Phra Mahā Chatchai Rakkhitacitto was born in Udon Thani in 1957 and ordained at Wat Jetiyabhumi in Khon Khaen in 1977.
He is an advanced level dhamma scholar.
Currently, Phra Mahā Chatchai is the assistant abbot at Wat Phleng, Soi Charansanitwong 75, Bangkok, Thailand.
He teaches mettā meditation every Sunday.
